name: Viteri's Revolution
description:
This is a work of fiction intented as parody. Any similarity to actual persons, living or dead, or actual events, is totally intentional.

Having say that, most charactes are there to serve as a means to foward the little plot there is, so the ony similarity with actual users is mostly in name only.

The only important stats in the game are HP, Atk and Def, nothing more. The combat is simple but follows the mechanics of games like AW or Langrisser where a unit will deal less damage the less hp it has.
